item.title: Fix 404 Error When Pushing Hugo to a Github Repository that Points to a Custom Domain
item.description: The Problem You once experienced the joy of seeing your Hugo site up on github pages pointing to a custom url. Then you decided to push new pages to the repo and your custom domain is a 404 page! What’s happening?? The Solution When you update your repository’s Github Pages settings to point to a custom domain, Github creates a file CNAME inside your directory /docs. You may have accidentally overwrote this file when you did your last git push!
